channel.title: Bladez on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Bladez on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Fearsome Fate
item.description: In the previous episodes, Tom finally got a new scan of his favorite Creature, Maxxor, but when he used it for the first time in battle he realizes that something is wrong.

item.title: Rockwave and Roll
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a match between Peyton and his musical idol, with rights to a subtle tribute to one of KISS’ lead singer Gene Simmons
